title: Coronavirus outbreak: Ontario government updates latest measures on COVID-19 | LIVE - Global News

content: Ontario Premier Doug Ford announced on Monday that all non essential businesses are being ordered to close and would detail what falls under this category and what will remain open on Tuesday This measure would last for days as of Tuesday night but the chars
